===Glyph origin===
{{Han etym}}
Simplified from earlier {{zh-l|*灋}}, which was originally used to represent {{och-l|廢|to cast aside; to abrogate}}. {{och-l|去}} in this character is probably ideogrammatic, not phonetic.

===Etymology===
Sino-Tibetan. Cognate with {{cog|bo|བབས||shape, form, appearance}}, {{m|bo|དབྱིབས||shape, form, figure}}. Possibly cognate with {{och-l|凡|all, general, every; pattern, general rule}}; see there for more.
